mapper.sql: POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_CODE, P_POSITION_ID, REGION_NBR, SORT_NUM, NOTES, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT A.POSITION_ID id ,A.POSITION_NAME name,A.P_POSITION_ID pid FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' START WITH A.POSITION_ID = #{positionId} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.POSITION_ID = A.P_POSITION_ID

choose.when: SELECT A.POSITION_NAME, A.REGION_NBR, (SELECT TCR.REGION_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_REGION TCR WHERE TCR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND TCR.REGION_NBR=A.REGION_NBR) REGIONNAME, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF SDPR WHERE SDPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SDPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGPOSITIONNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_POSITION_REF SUPR WHERE SUPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SUPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGUSERNUM FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.P_POSITION_ID = #{positionId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT A.POSITION_NAME, A.REGION_NBR, (SELECT TCR.REGION_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_REGION TCR WHERE TCR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND TCR.REGION_NBR=A.REGION_NBR) REGIONNAME, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF SDPR WHERE SDPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SDPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGPOSITIONNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_POSITION_REF SUPR WHERE SUPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SUPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGUSERNUM FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' START WITH A.POSITION_ID = #{positionId} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.POSITION_ID = A.P_POSITION_ID

mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.P_POSITION_ID = #{positionId}
